text: Baeed (door) nahin ke agar Nabi tum sab biwiyon ko talaq dede to Allah usey aisi biwiyan tumhare badle mein ata farma de jo tumse behtar hon, sacchi musalman ,ba-iman, itaat guzar , tauba guzar, ibadat guzar, aur rozedar, khwa shohar deedha ho ya bakira (both previously wedded ones and virgins)
